heading: Other remedies not precluded
text:
Nothing in this article shall be construed to limit the power of the commissioner to
   take any other action authorized by this code with respect to any unlawful use or condition including, but not limited to, the
   commencement of an action or proceeding in a court or before the environmental control board or other administrative tribunal or
   the issuance of a peremptory order or to require that the commissioner issue a request for corrective action as a prerequisite to any
   other enforcement action.
